name: Time_demo v1.2.5
description:
Time is an unreleased work from Ziqi Wu, creator of Hidden Vault and Lemonade Memories. He incorporated his childhood dreams and memories into this game for the first time. It’s an exciting new puzzle and adventure game that will take you on a thrilling journey through the vastness of space.

Time breaks into your real life. Unlike anything you've played before, it has a unique puzzle design. You need to pay attention to clues from the real world and use sophisticated cipher techniques to unlock hidden secrets.

With a focus on time and exploration, Time promises to immerse players in an unforgettable gaming experience.

Time is produced and developed by Vapor. 

《时间》是《秘密金库》和《柠檬汽水的回忆》的游戏制作人吴子奇的未发表作品。历时多年打造，他首次将自己的童年梦想和记忆融入这个游戏。这是一个令人兴奋的新的解谜和冒险游戏，将带你在浩瀚的太空密室中进行一次奇妙的旅程。

《时间》打破第四面墙，闯入你的现实生活。与你以往玩过的任何游戏不同，它有着独特的谜题设计。你需要关注现实世界中的线索，结合使用精巧的密码技术来解开隐藏的秘密。

以时间和探索为核心，这款游戏将带给你沉浸而难忘的游戏体验。

《时间》由Vapor公司制作和开发。
